title: Low fat chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['2 chicken stock cubes, dissolved in 850ml boiling water', '1 bunch spring onions, shredded into fine strips', '1 small leek, sliced', '1 teaspoon Chinese 5-spice powder', '1 teaspoon finely grated fresh root ginger or 1/4 teaspoon dried ginger', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '50g thread noodles', '50g sweetcorn, defrosted if frozen', '50g cooked chicken, shredded into fine strips or QuornÂ®', '1 tablespoon cornflour, blended with 3 tablespoons cold water', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
